title: color vector — color
text: creates character vector represents colours printed, colours formatted hexadecimal strings.

title: color vector — color
text: x color(): character vector three kinds R colour specifications. as_color(): object coerced. is_color(): object test.

title: color vector — color
text: Colours can specified using either: color name (listed colors()) hexadecimal string form "#rrggbb" "#rrggbbaa" (see rgb) positive integer meaning palette().

title: color palettes — palette
text: ... palette(): list character vector three kinds R colour specifications.

title: color palettes — palette
text: Colours can specified using either: color name (listed colors()) hexadecimal string form "#rrggbb" "#rrggbbaa" (see rgb) positive integer meaning palette().
